title: The Appearance of the Murderer
overview: Lin Chuan, haunted by a classmate's mysterious death, spends ten years searching for the truth. Meanwhile, Shen Xia and her brother Shen Dong are drawn into a criminal underworld after a family tragedy. As their paths collide, a tense showdown between justice and crime unfolds, blending love, hate, and revenge in a captivating story.
